attributes.action: Outlaw tobacco completely and put health before taxes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since it is being proposed to outlaw packets of 10 cigarettes and branding, it is clear that the British Government is seeking to make life as difficult as possible for smokers and tobacco manufacturers/suppliers.

This being the case, I see no reason  not to outlaw tobacco completely.

I call on the Government to take the final step and ban tobacco completely, thereby demonstrating that they really do value health over taxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
